languages.text: Ксенос все еще в сознании, но не способен пошевелиться. Пусть внешне он и выглядит нормальным, едва заметные следы техночумы на теле указывают на то, что внутренности его частично выгрызены энтропической коррозией.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] В некоторых некронах еще просвечивают жизненные контуры, но похоже, что их матрица поведения безвозвратно сломана.

languages.text: This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its insides have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.
languages.original_text: Ксенос все еще в сознании, но не способен пошевелиться. Пусть внешне он и выглядит нормальным, едва заметные следы техночумы на теле указывают на то, что внутренности его частично выгрызены энтропической коррозией.

traits.locale_text: The barely visible traces of tech-plague on the xenos's body point out the reason — he may look normal, but his insides had been eaten away by the entropic corrosion.
The barely visible traces of tech-plague on the xenos's body point out the reason — he may look normal, but his insides had been eaten away by the entropic corrosion.

This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though, it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its innards have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.

This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though, it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its innards have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.

This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its insides have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.

This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its insides have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.

languages.text: El xenos sigue consciente pero no puede moverse. Aunque por fuera parece estar intacto, las ligeras trazas de tecnoplaga en su cuerpo indican que sus entrañas ya han sido devoradas parcialmente por la corrosión entrópica.
languages.original_text: This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its insides have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.

traits.locale_text: El xenos sigue consciente pero no puede moverse. Aunque por fuera parece estar intacto, las ligeras trazas de tecnoplaga en su cuerpo indican que sus entrañas ya han sido devoradas parcialmente por la corrosión entrópica.

languages.text: Ce xénos est encore conscient, mais ne peut pas bouger. Bien qu'il paraisse intact à l'extérieur, les quelques traces de technopeste sur son corps laissent deviner que la corrosion entropique a déjà commencé à ronger ses entrailles.
languages.original_text: This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its insides have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.

traits.locale_text: Ce xénos est encore conscient, mais ne peut pas bouger. Bien qu'il paraisse intact à l'extérieur, les quelques traces de technopeste sur son corps laissent deviner que la corrosion entropique a déjà commencé à ronger ses entrailles.

languages.text: この異種族はまだ意識はあるが動くことはできない。外観からは何ごともないように見えるが、その体のテック・ブライトの微かな痕跡からすると、内部は既に一部エントロピー腐食に蝕まれているようだ。
languages.original_text: This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its insides have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.

traits.locale_text: この異種族はまだ意識はあるが動くことはできない。外観からは何ごともないように見えるが、その体のテック・ブライトの微かな痕跡からすると、内部は既に一部エントロピー腐食に蝕まれているようだ。

languages.text: 这只异形还有意识，但无法移动。尽管它看起来完好无损，但技术枯萎症留下的微弱痕迹表明，它的内部已经被熵腐蚀、吞噬了一部分。
languages.original_text: This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its insides have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.

traits.locale_text: 这只异形还有意识，但无法移动。尽管它看起来完好无损，但技术枯萎症留下的微弱痕迹表明，它的内脏已经被熵腐蚀、吞噬了一部分。

languages.text: Dieser Xenos ist noch bei Bewusstsein, kann sich aber nicht bewegen. Von außen wirkt er zwar intakt, doch die schwachen Spuren der Tech-Seuche an seinem Körper weisen darauf hin, dass sein Innenleben bereits teilweise von der entropischen Korrosion verschlungen wurde.
languages.original_text: This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its insides have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Xenos ist noch bei Bewusstsein, kann sich aber nicht bewegen. Von außen wirkt er zwar intakt, doch die schwachen Spuren der Tech-Seuche an seinem Körper weisen darauf hin, dass sein Innenleben bereits teilweise von der entropischen Korrosion verschlungen wurde.

languages.text: Bu zenonun bilinci hâlâ açık ama hareket edemiyor. Dışarıdan her şey normalmiş gibi gözükse de bedenindeki hafif tekno afeti izleri, iç organlarının entropik aşınma tarafından kısmen tüketildiğini belli ediyor.
languages.original_text: This xenos is still conscious but unable to move. Though it may appear intact on the outside, the faint traces of the tech-blight on its body indicate that its insides have already been partially devoured by the entropic corrosion.
